name: PSWinCom Gateway Client
tagline: Client library for connecting to PSWinCom Gateway XML api
body:
## Installing

```
	PM> Install-Package PSWinCom.Gateway.Client
```
### Sending SMS

```
Gateway
    .Client("https://xml.pswin.com", "username", "password")
	.Send(
	    new Sms("2077", "4799999999", "Test æøå")
	);
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
